document_title: Respiratory failure (acute): Causes, diagnosis, symptoms and treatment
subsection_content: To accurately diagnose the condition and extent of damage to the respiratory system, the doctor will check the patient's medical history, ask about symptoms, perform a physical examination and ask the patient to perform a number of testing methods. Necessary clinical testing.
subsection_data:
suy ho hap.json. Diagnostic method
To accurately diagnose the condition and extent of damage to the respiratory system, the doctor will check the patient's medical history, ask about symptoms, perform a physical examination and ask the patient to perform a number of testing methods. Necessary clinical testing.
